The Russian End X

War in Ukraine revealed a great deal of documented self-inflicted deaths by Russian soldiers on the battlefield. As of today 254 of them† arrived at suicide as the best possible outcome, and were filmed committing one. Puzzling to think about and terrible to watch, this phenomena seems increasingly characteristic for Russian army, truly unmatched in this grim respect.

While everyone can conteplate the reasons, the goal of this page is to merely document these bizzare acts in light of their public significance. We're sourcing data from social media.

  • † Conclusive 254
  • Inconclusive 64
  • Grenade 95
  • Other 7
